title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Use STARs and APPs in MSFS
description:
STAR''s and APPs better known as Standard Terminal Approach Route and Approaches. They can be used in combination, but the approach can also be used on it's own. In this video we will look at how to use them and eventually also how to use them in an aircraft with Simbrief integration as well as "pre-programming" the STAR and approach which is normally not done as they will be instructed by ATC.
